def plotly_graph_state(state):
    temp = df[df['State/UnionTerritory']==state]
    trace0 = go.Scatter(
        x = temp.index,
        y = temp['Confirmed'],
        mode = 'lines+markers',
        marker = dict(color='green'),
        name = 'Confirmed Cases in {0}'.format(state)
    )
    layout = go.Layout(
        title = 'Confirmed Cases in {0}'.format(state)
    )
    fig = go.Figure(
        data = [trace0],
        layout = layout
    )
    plo.iplot(fig)

    )
